ads.description_raw: Price: £95,000. The car has a full Audi history and needs for nothing with the last service completed at the end of Sept. The outside bodywork and wheels are as new, as is the interior and Recaro seats having only covered 13,000 miles. The grill, badges and petrol cap are finished in black rather than Chrome and the whole car has a Full Body PPF self healing wrap fitted by Signature Group which has a 7 year guarantee and cost 4.3k. If you google it the car being done features on their youtube videos. The sound and power are absolutely incredible having being enhance and perfectly complemented by a full Capristo Exhaust System costing just over 4.8k. This is completely programmable in the driving modes and exhaust sounds settings on the steering wheels controls. I'm happy to take this off as I have the original standard exhaust too which will come with the car. I also have a full KW height adjustable coilover magnetic ride suspension kit. Although this isn't currently fitted. I have an indoor and outdoor Audi cover and there  is also a S5 tracker fitted.  The car has no finance outstanding and is priced correctly based on the extras it has and the condition it is in. You may find a cheaper one but will not see a better example. Whilst I feel like selling it I don't need to so no offers, no part exchanges or traders. Proof of funding will be required to arrange to see the car with is currently in secure super car storage in Surrey. Thanks., Next MOT due 01/05/2020, Full service history, Grey, 2 owners, £95,000
